title: Saladin and suffragettes
itunes:title: Saladin and suffragettes
itunes:subtitle: John Man – author of a new biography of Saladin – explains how the medieval Muslim leader was able to triumph over the crusaders. Meanwhile, we talk to historian June Purvis about why the votes for women campaign turned to violence....
description:
John Man – author of a new biography of Saladin – explains how the medieval Muslim leader was able to triumph over the crusaders. Meanwhile, we talk to historian June Purvis about why the votes for women campaign turned to violence. 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
